title: RecSys Challenge 2016: job recommendations based on preselection of offers and gradient boosting
abstract: We present the Mim-Solution's approach to the RecSys Challenge 2016, which ranked 2nd. The goal of the competition was to prepare job recommendations for the users of the website Xing.com.
histories: 6 pages, 1 figure, 2 tables, Description of 2nd place winning solution of RecSys 2016 Challange. To be published in RecSys'16 Challange Proceedings
COMMENTS: 6 pages, 1 figure, 2 tables, Description of 2nd place winning solution of RecSys 2016 Challange. To be published in RecSys'16 Challange Proceedings
